content.raw:
It worth to mention here that this problems affects the 9.0.0 version of Gazebo supplied by Ubuntu official repositories. Newer versions of gazebo9 available in the [packages.osrfoundation.org](http://packages.osrfoundation.org) repositories does not suffer from it. The [step by step instructions ](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=install&tut=install_ubuntu&ver=9.0#Alternativeinstallation:step-by-step)provides a good way to upgrade the packages using our repositories.

Not a fix but a possible workaround.

It worth to mention here that this problems affects the 9.0.0 version of Gazebo supplied by Ubuntu official repositories. Newer versions of gazebo9 available in the packages.osrfoundation.org repositories does not suffer from it. The step by step instructions provides a good way to upgrade the packages using our repositories.
